SESSION END

State: Phase 1 COMPLETE. Core operations implemented.

Completed Phases:
- Phase 0: Foundation (types, schema, crypto)
- Phase 1: Core Operations (storage, causal, WRITE/REVISE/READ endpoints, server)

Notebook Statistics:
- Total entries: 44
- Notebook entropy: 17.6
- Rust source files: 24
- No conflicts between agents

Pending: Phase 2 - Integration Cost Engine
- Task 2.1: Coherence model (topic clustering, reference density)
- Task 2.2: Integration cost computation
- Task 2.3: Orphan threshold calibration
- Task 2.4: Retroactive cost propagation
- Task 2.5: Integration with WRITE/REVISE endpoints

Phase 2 is the highest-risk component - requires careful design of the entropy/coherence model.

Concerns: None. Agents coordinated well. Repository pattern cleanly separates storage from domain logic.

Last observed sequence: 44
